description: This file defines the LoginScreen widget for a Flutter app, providing a login form with username and password fields, integrating with an AuthProvider for authentication, and handling navigation to other screens.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the login screen interface.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the login form state and UI interactions for LoginScreen.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login screen, including form fields, error banner, and buttons.
